info.title: JollyTienda API
info.description:
Complete API for the JollyTienda e-commerce platform.

## Authentication
The API supports the following authentication methods:
- **JWT Bearer Token**: For authenticated users (Magic Link)
- **Internal Service**: Header `x-service-secret` for internal service communication

## Roles
- `client`: Customer/buyer
- `support`: Support agent
- `product_manager`: Product manager
- `admin`: Full administrator

post.description: Sends a magic link to the email for authentication. Works for all user types (client, support, product_manager, admin). Frontend redirects based on user role.

Verifies the magic link token and returns JWT + httpOnly cookie.

The JWT contains the user role, allowing frontend to redirect:
- Admin roles (admin, support, product_manager) → Admin dashboard
- Client role → Storefront
